segments.text: Looking at the kitchen, I notice how mundane it is, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that water overflowing the sink ignites a sense of urgency in me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman paying attention? She could slip any second now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies in the jar, tempting yet forbidden, and I feel a twinge of nostalgia.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the potential disaster brewing is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but think of the risks the children are taking, and it leaves me feeling uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple moment, but it feels like it could spiral out of control at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
